SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.ui

Class Flow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.ui.Flow
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, ClientAction, Runnable, Remote
public class Flow extends Object implements Runnable, ClientAction, GameListener
This class manages the flow of the game, handling the user interface (UI) and the events.
